name: Morning hygiene
opDef: (1) Go through entire routine (2) brush teeth within 3 hours

name: Daily executive
opDef: (1) Spend 10 minutes planning out day (2) write to-do list

name: Academic intention
opDef: (1) Spend the period 9AM-8PM working on responsibilities (2) 60 minutes

name: Exercise
opDef: (1) Exercise for at least 10 minutes (2) be in the ready position

name: Night at 11 PM
opDef: (1) In bed by 11:50 PM (2) In bed by 12:50 AM
